description: This file defines a TodoModel class that manages a list of todo items, including methods for adding, toggling, removing, updating, and clearing todos. It also includes a nanoid function for generating unique IDs and exports the TodoModel as the default export.

classes.name: TodoModel
classes.description: A class that manages a list of todo items with methods to modify and retrieve the list.

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Adds a new todo item with a generated ID and the given title.

methods.name: toggleItem
methods.description: Toggles the completed status of a specific todo item.

methods.name: removeItem
methods.description: Removes a specified todo item from the list.

methods.name: updateItem
methods.description: Updates the title of a specified todo item.

methods.name: toggleAll
methods.description: Sets the completed status for all todo items.

methods.name: getTodos
methods.description: Returns a copy of the current list of todos.
